channel.title: McKinley Park Development Council
channel.description: Recent content on McKinley Park Development Council

item.title: Great Rivers Project Walk Audit
item.description: Calling all McKinley Parkers! Did you know the Chicago River forms the western border of McKinley Park? Help us improve - and improve access to! - this neighborhood treasure (well…it will be!). Join the McKinley Park Development Council on Saturday April 7 from 9-11 am at the Eleanor Boathouse (2828 S Eleanor) and learn what a Walk Audit is - and how to do one - with the goal of ensuring that McKinley Park’s voices are heard as we work to improve access to the River from McKinley Park.

item.title: March Social Meeting! March 21, 2018
item.description: Join us for a tour of Razzmatazz Family Fun Center, some brief neighborhood updates and then a lot of family friendly fun. Wednesday, March 21, 2018 7pm - 8:30pm. Razzmatazz Family Fun Center 3900 S. Ashland Ave., Chicago, IL 60609 (773) 376-2900 Special thanks to our host, Razzmatazz Family Fun Center! We hope you can join us!

item.title: MPDC Gets a Shout Out from Cook County Board Candidate
item.description: Candidate for Cook County Board of Commissioners, Alma Anaya posted an editorial, What is the Future of Our Neighborhood? in the McKinleyPark.news, citing the work of the MPDC in the context of development in McKinley Park.

item.title: First Public Meeting! Jan 17, 2018
item.description: Join us at our first public meeting at the National Latino Education Institute Wednesday, January 17, 2018 7pm - 8:30pm. Learn about what we’ve been doing, what we plan to do and how you can get involved to help make McKinley Park an even better neighborhood. Special thanks to our host, National Latino Education Institute! We hope you can join us!

item.title: Holiday Meet & Greet at One City Tap Dec 18, 2017
item.description: Please join us on Monday December 18, 2017 6:30 - 8 pm at One City Tap (3115 S Archer) We have lots of reasons to celebrate: The holiday season, our founding year, the grant we recently received from Chicago Metropolitan Agency for Planning (CMAP) to create a Neighborhood Plan for McKinley Park, and you, our excellent neighbors! We look forward to a 2018 full of McKinley Park Activity: We are opening up our membership to the entire community, starting with our first meeting January 17 (mark your calendars!

item.title: Citizens Guide to Zoning Workshop Video
item.description: Video of the Citizens Guide to Zoning Workshop held on October 16, 2017.

item.title: Citizen's Guide to Zoning: Understand How Development Works in Your Neighborhood
item.description: With vacant lots, demolitions, and rezoning applications pointing to new development coming to McKinley Park, the McKinley Park Development Council (MPDC) invites you and your neighbors to attend our inaugural workshop - a Citizens Guide to Zoning: Understanding how development works in your neighborhood. Join MPDC and your neighbors to learn and ask questions about what zoning is; how it works; and what it means for our neighborhood, so we can move forward, together, with more knowledge!

item.title: Why We Need a Plan
item.description: In this video we explain why we think McKinley Park needs a plan. The video helped us win a grant from the Chicago Community Trust.
